member.name: T:Mono.TextEditor.Highlighting.CloneableStack`1
member.summary: A fast stack used by spans in highlighting that is: * cloneable in constant time * equatable in constant time * when enumerating the items go from top to bottom (the .NET stack implementation does the opposite)

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.TextEditorData.SuppressTooltips
member.summary: If set the tooltips wont show up.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.TextEditorData.EolMarker
member.value: The eol mark used in this document - it's taken from the first line in the document, if no eol mark is found it's using the default (Environment.NewLine). The value is saved, even when all lines are deleted the eol marker will still be the old eol marker.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.TextEditorData.FixVirtualIndentation
member.summary: Removes the indent on the caret line, if the indent mode is set to virtual and the indent matches the current virtual indent in that line.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.TextEditorData.SelectionRange
member.summary: Gets or sets the selection range. If nothing is selected (Caret.Offset, 0) is returned.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.TextEditorData.EnsureCaretIsNotVirtual
member.summary: Ensures the caret is not in a virtual position by adding whitespaces up to caret position. That method should always be called in an undo group.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.TextEditorData.TextPasteHandler
member.summary: Gets or sets the text paste handler.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.TextEditorData.CreateImmutable(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates the a text editor data object which document can't be changed. This is useful for 'view' only documents.
member.remarks: The Document itself is very fast because it uses a special case buffer and line splitter implementation. Additionally highlighting is turned off as default.

member.name: T:Mono.TextEditor.Utils.Diff.SMSRD
member.summary: Shortest Middle Snake Return Data

members.member:
Scan the tables of which lines are inserted and deleted, producing an edit script in forward order.
dynamic array

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.Utils.Diff.SMS``1(Mono.TextEditor.Utils.DiffData{``0},System.Int32,System.Int32,Mono.TextEditor.Utils.DiffData{``0},System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32[],System.Int32[])
member.summary: This is the algorithm to find the Shortest Middle Snake (SMS).
member.param: sequence A
lower bound of the actual range in DataA
upper bound of the actual range in DataA (exclusive)
sequence B
lower bound of the actual range in DataB
upper bound of the actual range in DataB (exclusive)
a vector for the (0,0) to (x,y) search. Passed as a parameter for speed reasons.
a vector for the (u,v) to (N,M) search. Passed as a parameter for speed reasons.
member.returns: a MiddleSnakeData record containing x,y and u,v

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.Utils.Diff.LCS``1(Mono.TextEditor.Utils.DiffData{``0},System.Int32,System.Int32,Mono.TextEditor.Utils.DiffData{``0},System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32[],System.Int32[])
member.summary: This is the divide-and-conquer implementation of the longest common-subsequence (LCS) algorithm. The published algorithm passes recursively parts of the A and B sequences. To avoid copying these arrays the lower and upper bounds are passed while the sequences stay constant.
member.param: sequence A
lower bound of the actual range in DataA
upper bound of the actual range in DataA (exclusive)
sequence B
lower bound of the actual range in DataB
upper bound of the actual range in DataB (exclusive)
a vector for the (0,0) to (x,y) search. Passed as a parameter for speed reasons.
a vector for the (u,v) to (N,M) search. Passed as a parameter for speed reasons.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.Utils.CompressingTreeList`1.SetRange(System.Int32,System.Int32,`0)
member.summary: Sets indices starting at to

summary.p: This class represents an immutable character sequence with fast {@link #concat concatenation}, {@link #insert insertion} and {@link #delete deletion} capabilities (O[Log(n)]) instead of O[n] for StringBuffer/StringBuilder).

p.i: Implementation Note: To avoid expensive copy operations , {@link ImmutableText} instances are broken down into smaller immutable sequences, they form a minimal-depth binary tree. The tree is maintained balanced automatically through tree rotations. Insertion/deletions are performed in O[Log(n)] instead of O[n] for StringBuffer/StringBuilder.

member.name: F:Mono.TextEditor.Utils.ImmutableText.BLOCK_SIZE
member.summary: Holds the default size for primitive blocks of characters.

member.name: F:Mono.TextEditor.Utils.ImmutableText.BLOCK_MASK
member.summary: Holds the mask used to ensure a block boundary cesures.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.Utils.ImmutableText.Length
member.summary: Returns the length of this text.
member.value: the number of characters (16-bits Unicode) composing this text.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.Utils.ImmutableText.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets/Sets a single character. Runs in O(lg N) for random access. Sequential read-only access benefits from a special optimization and runs in amortized O(1).

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.Utils.ImmutableText.Concat(Mono.TextEditor.Utils.ImmutableText)
member.summary: Concatenates the specified text to the end of this text. This method is very fast (faster even than StringBuffer.append(String)) and still returns a text instance with an internal binary tree of minimal depth!
member.param: that the text that is concatenated.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.Utils.ImmutableText.InsertText(System.Int32,Mono.TextEditor.Utils.ImmutableText)
member.summary: Returns the text having the specified text inserted at the specified location.
member.param: index the insertion position.
txt the text being inserted.
member.returns: subtext(0, index).concat(txt).concat(subtext(index))

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.Utils.ImmutableText.RemoveText(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the text without the characters between the specified indexes.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.Utils.ImmutableText.GetText(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a portion of this text.
member.returns: the sub-text starting at the specified start position and ending just before the specified end position.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.Utils.ImmutableText.CopyTo(System.Char[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies the whole content of the immutable text into the specified array. Runs in O(N).
member.remarks: This method counts as a read access and may be called concurrently to other read accesses.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.Utils.ImmutableText.CopyTo(System.Int32,System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies the a part of the immutable text into the specified array. Runs in O(lg N + M).
member.remarks: This method counts as a read access and may be called concurrently to other read accesses.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.Utils.ImmutableText.ToArray
member.summary: Creates an array and copies the contents of the rope into it. Runs in O(N).
member.remarks: This method counts as a read access and may be called concurrently to other read accesses.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.Utils.ImmutableText.ToArray(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an array and copies the contents of the rope into it. Runs in O(N).
member.remarks: This method counts as a read access and may be called concurrently to other read accesses.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.Utils.ImmutableText.EnsureChunked
member.summary: When first loaded, ImmutableText contents are stored as a single large array. This saves memory but isn't modification-friendly as it disallows slightly changed texts to retain most of the internal structure of the original document. Whoever retains old non-chunked version will use more memory than really needed.
member.returns: A copy of this text better prepared for small modifications to fully enable structure-sharing capabilities

member.name: T:Mono.TextEditor.HeightTree
member.summary: The height tree stores the heights of lines and provides a performant conversion between y and lineNumber. It takes care of message bubble heights and the height of folded sections.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.DocumentLine.Length
member.summary: Gets the length of the line.
member.remarks: The length does not include the line delimeter.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.DocumentLine.UnicodeNewline
member.summary: Gets the unicode newline for this line. Returns UnicodeNewline.Unknown for no new line (in the last line of the document)

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.DocumentLine.DelimiterLength
member.summary: Gets the length of the line terminator. Returns 1 or 2; or 0 at the end of the document.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.DocumentLine.Offset
member.summary: Gets the start offset of the line.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.DocumentLine.LengthIncludingDelimiter
member.summary: Gets the length of the line including the line delimiter.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.DocumentLine.Segment
member.summary: Gets the text segment of the line.
member.remarks: The text segment does not include the line delimeter.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.DocumentLine.SegmentIncludingDelimiter
member.summary: Gets the text segment of the line including the line delimiter.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.DocumentLine.EndOffset
member.summary: Gets the end offset of the line.
member.remarks: The end offset does not include the line delimeter.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.DocumentLine.EndOffsetIncludingDelimiter
member.summary: Gets the end offset of the line including the line delimiter.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.DocumentLine.LineNumber
member.summary: Gets the number of this line. The first line has the number 1.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.DocumentLine.NextLine
member.summary: Gets the next line. Returns null if this is the last line in the document.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.DocumentLine.PreviousLine
member.summary: Gets the previous line. Returns null if this is the first line in the document.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.DocumentLine.GetIndentation(Mono.TextEditor.TextDocument)
member.summary: This method gets the line indentation.
member.param: The the line belongs to.
member.returns: The indentation of the line (all whitespace chars up to the first non ws char).

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.DocumentLine.Contains(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether this line contains the specified offset.
member.returns: true if this line contains the specified offset (upper bound exclusive); otherwise, false.
member.param: The offset.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.DocumentLine.Contains(Mono.TextEditor.TextSegment)
member.summary: Determines whether this line contains the specified segment.
member.returns: true if this line contains the specified segment (upper bound inclusive); otherwise, false.
member.param: The segment.

member.name: T:Mono.TextEditor.ISelectionSurroundingProvider
member.summary: A selection surrounding provider handles a special handling how the text editor behaves when the user types a key with a selection. The selection can be surrounded instead of beeing replaced.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.ISelectionSurroundingProvider.GetSelectionSurroundings(Mono.TextEditor.TextEditorData,System.UInt32,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Gets the selection surroundings for a given unicode key.
member.returns: true, if the key is valid for a surrounding action.
member.param: The key to handle.
The start of the surrounding
The end of the surrounding

member.name: T:Mono.TextEditor.NullSelectionSurroundingProvider
member.summary: Null selection surrounding provider. Basically turns off that feature.

member.name: T:Mono.TextEditor.DefaultSelectionSurroundingProvider
member.summary: Default selection surrounding provider.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.IActionTextLineMarker.MousePressed(Mono.TextEditor.MonoTextEditor,Mono.TextEditor.MarginMouseEventArgs)
member.returns: true, if the mouse press was handled - false otherwise.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.TextLineMarker.DrawBackground(Mono.TextEditor.MonoTextEditor,Cairo.Context,Mono.TextEditor.LineMetrics)
member.summary: Draws the background of the text.
member.returns: true, if background was drawn, false otherwise.
member.param: The editor.
The cairo context.
The y coordinate.
The line metrics.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.TextLineMarker.DrawAfterEol(Mono.TextEditor.MonoTextEditor,Cairo.Context,Mono.TextEditor.EndOfLineMetrics)
member.summary: Is used to draw in the area after the visible text.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.TextArea.TabsToSpaces
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this converts tabs to spaces. It is possible to overwrite the default options value for certain languages (like F#).
member.value: true if tabs to spaces should be converted; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.TextArea.SimulateKeyPress(Gdk.Key,System.UInt32,Gdk.ModifierType)
member.summary: Handles key input after key mapping and input methods.
member.param: The mapped keycode.
A UCS4 character. If this is nonzero, it overrides the keycode.
Keyboard modifier, excluding any consumed by key mapping or IM.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.TextArea.SetCursor(Gdk.Cursor)
member.summary: Sets the mouse cursor of the gdk window and avoids unnecessary native calls.

member.summary: Use this method with care.

member.name: T:Mono.TextEditor.MarginDrawMetrics
member.summary: Contains all information about a margin draw event. This class is used inside .

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.MarginDrawMetrics.Margin
member.summary: The margin that should be drawn.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.MarginDrawMetrics.Area
member.summary: The area that needs to be redrawn.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.MarginDrawMetrics.LineSegment
member.summary: The line segment the margin should draw (can be null).

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.MarginDrawMetrics.LineNumber
member.summary: The line number of the line segment (can be negative, if the line segment is null).

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.MarginDrawMetrics.X
member.summary: The X position of the margin.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.MarginDrawMetrics.Y
member.summary: The Y postion of the margin draw event.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.MarginDrawMetrics.Width
member.summary: The Width of the margin.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.MarginDrawMetrics.Height
member.summary: The height of the current line.

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.MarginDrawMetrics.Right
member.summary: X + Width

member.name: P:Mono.TextEditor.MarginDrawMetrics.Bottom
member.summary: Y + Height

member.name: T:Mono.TextEditor.MarginMarker
member.summary: The margin marker is a specialized text line marker used to change how a margins of a line are drawn. (If the margin supports custom drawing plugins) Note: This is not used for the text view margin, which is handled by the basic TextLineMarker class.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.MarginMarker.CanDrawBackground(Mono.TextEditor.Margin)
member.summary: Determines whether this margin marker can draw the background of the specified margin.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.MarginMarker.CanDrawForeground(Mono.TextEditor.Margin)
member.summary: Determines whether this margin marker can draw the foreground of the specified margin.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.MarginMarker.DrawForeground(Mono.TextEditor.MonoTextEditor,Cairo.Context,Mono.TextEditor.MarginDrawMetrics)
member.summary: Draws the foreground of the specified margin.

member.name: M:Mono.TextEditor.MarginMarker.DrawBackground(Mono.TextEditor.MonoTextEditor,Cairo.Context,Mono.TextEditor.MarginDrawMetrics)
member.summary: Draws the background of the specified margin.
member.returns: true, if the background is drawn. false if the margin should fallback to the default background renderer.
